name: 曾恕銘
objective: 本課程介紹無線傳輸技術的基礎和最新發展(R15:5G Phase 1 in 2018)，內容包含訊號與系統基礎，數位通訊基礎，行動通訊基礎，CDMA/SCMA for 5G，資料偵測和干擾消除，MIMO (spatial multiplexing/spatial transmit diversity/beamforming)，OFDMA，4G MIMO傳輸模式/NOMA(non-orthogonal multiple access) for 5G，偵測與估計(感知無線電 追蹤預測物體軌跡)。
schedule:
1.　　Signals and linear systems
2.  Digital communications (including random processes, linear algebra)
3.　　Mobile communication fundamentals (cellular system, propagation model, diversity)
4.　　CDMA/SCMA for 5G
5.　　Data detection/interference cancellation for CDMA etc.
6.　　MIMO(Spatial Multiplexing/MU-MIMO/STBC/distributed STBC/beamforming) 
7.　　OFDM(A) (principle/synchronization/channel estimation/power allocation)
8.　　4G Overview/MIMO Modes/Link Adaption, 5G NOMA (Non-orthogonal multiple access)
9. 　　Estimation, hypothesis testing, linear regression, Kalman filter (偵測與估計)
scorePolicy:
Oral report 1 (part of handouts): 20%
Exam: 40% 
Oral report 2 (a course-related paper): 40%
materials:
Textbooks: handouts
